levels.description:
<@ba.rem>The first deployment costs 0 DP, places a Shadow Sentry on the field, and immediately refreshes Redeployment Time</>
After deployment, <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK, immediately retrieves the Shadow Sentry, and deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies it passes through; while active, gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP for each attack on an enemy

<@ba.rem>The first deployment costs 0 DP, places a Shadow Sentry on the field, and immediately refreshes Redeployment Time</>
After deployment, <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK, immediately retrieves the Shadow Sentry, and deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies it passes through; while active, gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP for each attack on an enemy
